com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr

Class PaymentPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr.PaymentPreferences
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaymentPreferencesV3

    @Immutable
@LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public abstract class PaymentPreferences
extends Object
    Class to encompass the PaymentPreferences at the end of QR codes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int COLOR_UNKNOWN
      Return code for when a color cannot be parsed or is otherwise missing.
      protected String mPaymentPreferences
      The payment preferences string passed in from the constructor.

      Subclasses must implement this to return the color index parsed or COLOR_UNKNOWN.

        Return code for when a color cannot be parsed or is otherwise missing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PaymentPreferences

        protected PaymentPreferences(String paymentPreferences)
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        protected abstract int getColor()
        Subclasses must implement this to return the color index parsed or COLOR_UNKNOWN.
        Returns:
        the color index (in the array) or COLOR_UNKNOWN if none could be parsed.

      • getColorPreference

        public static int getColorPreference(String preferenceData)
        Gets the color index of the provided preferenceData.
        Parameters:
        preferenceData - the preference string from the QR code.
        Returns:
        the color from the QR code or COLOR_UNKNOWN if parsing failed.
